catool: Walkthrough

Source: vignettes/catool-walkthrough.Rmd
catool-walkthrough.Rmd

üîç Introduction

This vignette demonstrates how to use the catool R package to calculate overload compensation for instructors based on institutional course schedules and compensation policies.

The package supports both individual instructor analysis and full-schedule summaries, applying proration and eligibility rules based on enrollment and credit hours.

üè´ Load Schedule 

# Replace with your actual file path
# Fallback example for demonstration
schedule <- data.frame(
  INSTRUCTOR = c("Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha", "Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha", "Smith, John"),
  ENRLD = c(12, 7, 4),
  HRS = c(3, 3, 3),
  stringsAsFactors = FALSE
)

üë§ Get Schedule for One Instructor 

get_instructor_schedule("Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha", schedule)
##                INSTRUCTOR ENRLD HRS
## 1 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha    12   3
## 2 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha     7   3

üíµ Calculate Overload Compensation for One Instructor 

IS <- get_instructor_schedule("Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha", schedule)
ol_comp(IS)  # Default institutional policy
##                INSTRUCTOR ENRLD HRS Overload Pay by Course
## 1 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha    12   3                      0
## 2 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha     7   3                      0
## 3                                                         
## 4                                                         
## 5                                                         
##                      Summary Total Compensation (USD)
## 1                                                    
## 2                                                    
## 3 Over 12 QUALIFIED CR. HRS:                        0
## 4              OVERLOAD PAY:                       $0
## 5                      NOTE:
# Custom policy example
ol_comp(IS, L = 4, U = 8, reg_load = 9, rate_per_cr = 5000 / 3)
##                INSTRUCTOR ENRLD HRS Overload Pay by Course
## 1 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha    12   3                      0
## 2 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha     7   3                      0
## 3                                                         
## 4                                                         
## 5                                                         
##                     Summary Total Compensation (USD)
## 1                                                   
## 2                                                   
## 3 Over 9 QUALIFIED CR. HRS:                        0
## 4             OVERLOAD PAY:                       $0
## 5                     NOTE:

üë• List Unique Instructors in the Schedule 

get_unique_instructors(schedule)
##                INSTRUCTOR
## 1 Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha
## 2             Smith, John

üî¢ Summarize Overload Compensation by Instructor Index 

ol_comp_byindex(1, schedule_df = schedule)
##               INSTRUCTOR ENRLD HRS Overload Pay by Course
##                                                          
##  Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha    12   3                      0
##  Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha     7   3                      0
##

##  INSTRUCTOR: Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha                         
##                                                              
##                                                              
##           Over 12 QUALIFIED CR. HRS:                        0
##                        OVERLOAD PAY:                       $0
##                                NOTE:
ol_comp_byindex(1, schedule_df = schedule, L = 4, U = 9, rate_per_cr = 2500 / 3, reg_load = 12)
##               INSTRUCTOR ENRLD HRS Overload Pay by Course
##                                                          
##  Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha    12   3                      0
##  Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha     7   3                      0
##                                                          
##                                                          
##                                                          
##                              Summary Total Compensation (USD)
##  INSTRUCTOR: Lalau-Hitchcock, Diksha                         
##                                                              
##                                                              
##           Over 12 QUALIFIED CR. HRS:                        0
##                        OVERLOAD PAY:                       $0
##                                NOTE:

üìù Explanation

The catool package determines overload compensation using institutional rules based on:

  • Enrollment (ENRLD)
  • Credit hours (HRS)
  • Regular teaching load (reg_load)
  • Per-credit compensation rate (rate_per_cr)

Key Concepts

  • Proration Range:

    • Courses with ENRLD < 4: No compensation
    • ENRLD between 4 and 9: Prorated pay
    • ENRLD ‚â• 10: Full pay (no proration)

  • Regular Load (reg_load): Only credit hours beyond this are considered for overload compensation.

  • Rate per Credit Hour: Default rate is 2500 / 3 (~833.33), customizable by the user.

Notes

  • All thresholds and pay rates are user-adjustable.
  • Output is returned as a tidy, readable tibble‚Äîready for reporting or export.

üì´ Questions?

For questions or feedback, please open a GitHub issue or contact Dawit Aberra at aberrad@fvsu.edu.
